Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=30 µg/ml), Bacillus dysenteriae (MIC=30 µg/ml), Helicobacter pylori NCTC 11637 (MIC=20 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 2592 (MIC=5 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC 2002 (MIC=25 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: An antimicrobial peptide with antimicrobial activity against Helicobacter pylori.
Literature.Author: Chen L, Li Y, Li J, Xu X, Lai R, Zou Q.
